attributes.action: Stop Poppy Burning on Rememberance Day
attributes.additional_details:
"Ahmed Bin Khan has confirmed that him along with millions of Muslims will burn Poppy's next month on Remembrance Day across the UK."

Let's make it illegal for them to so this. A law should be set in place for any person(s) to burn poppys or any remembrance symbol. If we burnt their Quran or remembrance symbols, it would be a crime and allot of issues would be set upon the induvidual.

Let's make it fair that everybody is treated the same and any induvidual who takes part should be considered for imprisonment or deportation.

#Support the British Troops
